"description": "

Color contrast (WCAG) 2.0 - https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG20/

- small text 4.5:1 - large text 3:1"

"annotation-description": "

\n There are various online and desktop tools
column2:
and plugins for Photoshop and Sketch to check color contrast level. Use these tools to make sure colors in your design are accessible.

WebAIM Color Contrast Checker "

column1:
"description": "

Primary colors represent the Trinet brand. They are bright and bold colors
column2:
and they should be used sparingly to draw attention and communicate visual hierarchy. They are used in main interactive elements such as the primary button and inputs. They are not intended to be used for large background areas.

"
